DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy BL33 mild moderate benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) .There trial show electroacupuncture BL33 mild moderate BPH effective terazosin . It could reduce International Prostate Syndrome Score ( IPSS ) 6.68±2.84 ( 39.79 % ) , low urinary symptom bother score ( BS ) bladder residual urine , increase maximum urinary flow rate.But efficacy BL33 study . The objective study evaluate efficacy BL32 mild moderate BPH comparison non-acupoint group .
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Trial Electroacupuncture Points Bilateral BL33 Mild Moderate Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.detailed_description: efficacy mean specific effect ( active ingredient ) point BL33 .
